name: OnlySwitch
0:
”Alexa, Turn on Hall Light”
”Alexa, Turn on Hall Fan”
”Alexa, Increase hall fan speed”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des: Only Switch controls all the digital touch switches configured through the logged in user account. This smart home skill will list down the switches assigned to the user and enables to operate through Alexa app or through simple voice commands as shown in the example phrases.
